description:
This week we're taking a break from the straight guys to bring you James.
He says he's "99% gay," his only heterosexual experience was sticking his face in some girl's boobs.
He's got braces on his teeth and he's very self conscious about it. It was hard to get him to smile at first because of it, until I started questioning him about how it affects his ability to give oral sex.
The best part about James is that he's a shooter — watch him get himself all messy!
title: James
